title: the mighty Client's -'Trying to Reconnect' issue....
body: it has been months. MONTHS. i cannot play anymore because of this issue... when im in client, every few minutes ( between 1-5 ) i get the trying to reconnect window popping up. this cancels my queues, declines my games automatically. every time an "Accept" pops up it wont show me it and will go straight to 'trying to reconnect' then after a few seconds it will connect again like nothing happened. my duo can get the accpet but i cant. i tried everything. contaced my internet provider, tried every board in this site, tried the hextech tool. i need help from you riot because this is a problem IN THE CLIENT IT SELF. i cant solve it without you so please contact me soon

replies.body: It sounds like your network is really having some problems getting a solid signal with our servers for some reason if it's needing to reconnect that often. There's a good chance something is interfering with your network like firewalls or antivirus, so be sure to disable or add exceptions for League to those as well as going through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as some troubleshooting. Make sure you test this in a custom/practice game first!
